verbs.description: [ARG0: Scott] [V: emerges] [ARG1: as the big spender in the Trump administration] [ARGM-ADV: despite his net worth being the smallest among President Trump 's Cabinet members] .
Scott emerges as the big spender in the Trump administration despite [ARG1: his net worth] [V: being] [ARG2: the smallest among President Trump 's Cabinet members] .
